abstract: Former Kentucky Gov Steven L Beshear, Democrat who expanded health care in state under Affordable Care Act, announces creation of nonprofit group Save Kentucky Healthcare to push back against efforts by Republican Gov Matt Bevin to dismantle state health care exchange Kynect.
lead_paragraph: The state, already a test case for the embrace of Obama’s health care law, now stands to become one for attempts to undo it by the current governor.

headline.main: Kentucky Ex-Governor Aims to Halt Rollback of Obamacare Changes
headline.print_headline: Kentucky Ex-Governor Fights Health Care Changes

snippet: The state, already a test case for the embrace of Obama’s health care law, now stands to become one for attempts to undo it by the current governor.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
